patch.comment: Update lodash.

minor.comment: Add support for new "@eventproperty" AEDoc tag, which indicates that a class/interface property should be documented as an event
Add new IMarkupHtmlTag API
AEDoc now allows HTML tags inside doc comments, which can be disabled using a backslash escape
For namespaceSupport=permissive, allow arbitrary nesting of namespaces

patch.comment: Fix an issue where multi-line type literals sometimes had inconsistent newlines in the *.api.json file

minor.comment: Add support for new AEDoc tags @sealed, @virtual, and @override

patch.comment: Fix the formatting of a log message.
Fix an issue where the *.d.ts rollup trimming did not trim import statements
Fix errors in schema documentation
Refactor to use new @microsoft/node-core-library
Update build config so API Extractor builds using the latest version of itself
In preparation for initial release, the "Package Typings" feature was renamed to "DTS Rollup"
Fix an issue where the @packagedocumentation comment was sometimes getting mixed into the middle of the rollup *.d.ts file

minor.comment: Improve the api-extractor.json config file so that *.d.ts rollups go in separate folders, and trimming can now be disabled

patch.comment: Upgrade colors to version ~1.2.1
Improve packageTypings generator to trim nested members according to their release tag
Fix a bug where packageTypings failed to handle merged declarations properly

minor.comment: Overhaul the packageTypings generator analysis to get ready for the upcoming nested member trimming
Breaking change: Any projects using the package typings feature must now have a "tsdoc" section in their package.json

patch.comment: Add "--debug" flag for debugging

minor.comment: Add a new setting validationRules.missingReleaseTags to optionally remove the requirement that every API item should have a release tag
Add new API "Markup.formatApiItemReference()"

patch.comment: Fix an issue where the automatically generated documentation for class constructors sometimes had a broken hyperlink
Locked down some "@types/" dependency versions to avoid upgrade conflicts
Add preliminary support for preview and public outputs for packageTypings generator
Fix several bugs with the way that imports were being deduplicated by the packageTypings feature
Fix an issue where the packageTypings feature sometimes emitted "default" instead of the class name
Improve the packageTypings feature to support triple-slash references to typings

minor.comment: Fix an issue where the packageTypings feature didn't handle some import/export patterns

patch.comment: Force a patch bump in case the previous version was an empty package
Enable package typings generated by api-extractor

minor.comment: Improve the packageTypings feature to support abstract classes and "import * as X" imports

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Add some incremental improvements for the experimental PackageTypingsGenerator feature

minor.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to Node 8

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Continued progress for the experimental PackageTypingsGenerator

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Get web-build-tools building with pnpm

major.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
major.comment: API Extractor now processes *.d.ts files instead of *.ts files

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Introduced new tag @packagedocumentation which replaces the earlier approach that used a "packageDescription" variable

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Update Jest to ~21.2.1

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fixed an issue where warnings would cause the api-extractor tool to return a nonzero exit code for a "--local" build; warnings should not fail the build in this scenario

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Add Extractor.processProject() whose return value indicates success

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Deprecate Extractor.analyzeProject() API

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: lock the reference version between web build tools projects

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Upgrade cyclic dependencies

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Improved the way API JSON represents documentation markup; this is a file format change

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Updated cyclic dependencies

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fixed an issue where properties were sometimes marked as readonly; a remark is automatically generated for classes with internal constructors

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Add policies.namespaceSupport option to API Extractor config

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Rename ApiExtractor class to Extractor

major.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
major.comment: Redesigned interface for invoking API Extractor

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Removed IMarkupPage.docId

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: The *.api.json "linkDocElement" type now always explicitly specifies the package name, rather than expecting the reader to infer it

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: The *.api.json file format now exposes "signature" information for properties, functions, and module variables

minor.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Skipping two lines in an AEDoc comment now creates a paragraph separator for the generated documentation

minor.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to es6

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: The isBeta and deprecatedMessage fields are now inherited in the *.api.json files

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fix an issue where the *.api.json file was sometimes missing function parameters

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Deprecate @types/es6-coll ections in favor of built-in typescript typings 'es2015.collection' a nd 'es2015.iterable'

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fix incorrect schema/typings for enum members

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Add $schema field to all schemas
Converted IMarkupDocumentationLink to IMarkupApiLink, which exposes the underlying IApiItemReference rather than assuming a particular "document ID" model

minor.comment: Add the constructor signature and package name to the exported API signature
Expanded the api-extractor API to expose interfaces for the *.api.json file fileformat

major.comment: Fix compatibility issues with old releases, by incrementing the major version number

patch.comment: Fix issue where node-core-library was not an explicit dependency
Update the schema validator.
Added "api-documenter" code sample
Introduce Span parser for upcoming *.d.ts generator
Upgrade to the TS2.4 version of the build tools.

minor.comment: Upgrade to TypeScript 2.4
Add two new features: An error is reported if a top-level definition is missing its release tag. The constructor summary will now be autogenerated if omitted.

patch.comment: Improve the wording of many error messages
Fix a bug with parsing of @link tags
Issue warnings for @internal definitions that are not prefixed with an underscore
The unsupported @summary tag is now reported as an error
Use a cache to speed up package.json lookups
Definitions marked as @beta are now included in the *.api.json files for documentation
Updated README.md
Added support for Namespace with ApiNamespace
Added check for API names that are not supported (only letters and numbers supported)
Remove ES6 Promise & @types/es6-promise typings
Added collect references ability to detect determine type information of return types and parameter types.
Adjusted the version specifier for typescript to ~2.2.2
Removed hard coding of @public for ApiPackage

major.comment: Fixing whitespace, also a variable that was shadowing another variable.

patch.comment: Reverting change.
Reverting previous change, which causes a regression in SPFx yeoman sc enario.
Fixing lint whitespace issues.
Fixing variable that was shadowing another variable.
Locking `@types` packages. Synchronizing version specifiers for dependencies with other `web-build-tools` projects.

Seperated the ApiItem initialization into 3 stages: create documentation that doesn't require resolution, then complete initialization by resolving links and inheritdocs. This allows us to ignore harmless cycles like type references"
Fixed Api-Extractor error message, changed apostrophe to backtick.
Added support for local API definition resolution"
Changed dependency for ApiDocumentation to abstract the resolving of API definition references.
Added support to not throw error, instead report error if no type is declared on properties and parameters
Fixing issue where undocumented comment was not being emitted.
Moved ApiItem references within ApiDocumentation, to ApiItem caller.
Refactored ApiDocumentation creation to resolve references method.
Added ApiItemKind enum and refactored child classes.
Changed name of Analyzer to Extractor, added support for external api json doc loading.
Added ExternalApiHelper class to be used in generating api documentation json files for external types.
Added description for packages implementation.
Added config folder with file to enable api-extractor on itself. rebuild project on previous build.
Json schema was updated to reflect feature additions to linkDocElement. The linkDocElement can now be of type 'code' which refers to an API definition reference.
Check for missing JSDoc sequences changed.
Improved error messages

minor.comment: Updating API Extractor to work with TypeScript 2.1

patch.comment: @link capability for href and API definition references
